urlencoded.value: SELECT * FROM ( WITH /*Party Name*/xmlTable AS (SELECT /*+  CARDINALITY(xt,1)  */ xt.P0, xt.C_DEP_KEY FROM MTL_COPY_ORG_TEMP tempXML, XMLTABLE('/DATA/ROW' PASSING XMLTYPE(tempXML.TEMP_CLOB) COLUMNS P0 VARCHAR2(2000) PATH 'P0', C_DEP_KEY VARCHAR2(2000) PATH 'C_DEP_KEY') xt )SELECT party_name, xmlTable.C_DEP_KEY  FROM hz_parties, xmlTable  WHERE party_name = xmlTable.P0 GROUP BY xmlTable.C_DEP_KEY ,  party_name ORDER BY party_name )
